title: Golang String Formatting
description: This challenge aims to test your knowledge of string formatting in Golang. You will be required to format different types of data such as integers, floats, strings, and structs using various formatting verbs.

meta.title: Golang String Formatting: Mastering the Art of Data Presentation
meta.description: Explore the power of string formatting in Golang and learn how to effectively present integers, floats, strings, and structs.
meta.keywords: go playground, data presentation, go, golang, go labs, go playground online, tutorial, string formatting, programming, go lab

verify.name: Verify String Formatting Output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go 语言字符串格式化
i18n.description: 此挑战旨在测试你对 Go 语言中字符串格式化的了解。你需要使用各种格式化动词来格式化不同类型的数据，如整数、浮点数、字符串和结构体。

meta.title: Go 语言字符串格式化：掌握数据呈现艺术
meta.description: 探索 Go 语言中字符串格式化的强大功能，并学习如何有效地呈现整数、浮点数、字符串和结构体。
meta.keywords: Go 语言游乐场, 数据呈现, Go 语言, Go, Go 实验, 在线 Go 语言游乐场, 教程, 字符串格式化, 编程, Go 实验
